mapper.select: select A.firstOptionName as firstOptionName, o1.name as secondOptionName, A.remainAmount, po1.no from product_option po1, option o1, (select o.name as firstOptionName, po.no as productOptionNo, po.remainAmount from product_option po, option o where po.firstOptionNo=o.no and po.productNo=#{no}) A where A.productOptionNo=po1.no and po1.secondOptionNo=o1.no
